summary: Chef Ferran Adrià spends half the year making new culinary creations for his restaurant.
cast: Ferran Adrià|Oriol Castro|Eduard Xatruch|Eugeni de Diego|Aitor Lozano|Toni Morago|François Chartier|Christian Rioux|Eduard Bosch Maurell|Lluís Genaro|Mateu Casañas|Andrea C. Correa|Jesús Gonzàlez Rallo|Lluís Garcia|Pol Perelló|Marc Cruspinera|Francesc Guillamet
title: El Bulli: Cooking in Progress
